column4: hello, i am upgrading from 11.04 to 11.10 successful but now i had a little problem, qt apps and in my case skype looks ugly, in 11.04 skype follows the look of theme, now it look native qt app and some tooltips and text are unreadable because colors seems similar
is there solution of this problem or it's just in my machine
many issues with ubuntu 11.10 except looks,
